akn:content.akn:p: (a) Multilateral controls on proliferation It is the policy of the United States to seek multilaterally coordinated efforts with other countries to control the proliferation of chemical and biological weapons. In furtherance of this policy, the United States shall—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Multilateral controls on chemical agents, precursors, and equipment
